name: Robot Zombie Room 7
description:
*** ATTENTION *** 

This game will not work with Safari browsers. Please use other major supported browsers such as Chrome or Firefox. Thank you for your understanding.

Microsoft Edge browsers will work, however performance is very slow. I would not recommend it.  Windows and Mac builds will come soon.

*******************

A game made for Krassjam X by Zach Sarette in 2019.

CONTROLS:

Jump -->
Space, Xbox-A, B, X, or Y

Hit Right -->
Right Arrow or Left Stick Right

Hit Left -->
Left Arrow or Left Stick Left
